name: 李宜桓
objective: 教授化學儀器分析原理、應用、儀器裝置及準確度等。內容有紫外線/可見光、紅外線、螢光及拉曼光譜，核磁共振，X光光譜，質譜儀，層析儀，熱分析和電化學分析。另外介紹影像分析技術，包含掃描式及穿透式電子顯微鏡及原子力顯微鏡等。
schedule:
1. Introduction (1/2 week)
2. Instruments for Optical Spectroscopy (1 and 1/2 weeks)
3. UV & VIS (1 and 1/2 weeks)
4. IR (1 and 1/2 weeks)
5. Raman (1/2 week)
6. NMR (1 weeks)
7. MS (1 week)

    Mid-term Exam (1 week)

8. Thermal Methods (1 week)
9. Electroanalytical Chemistry (1 and 1/2 weeks)
10. An Introduction to Chromatographic Separations (1/2 week)
11. GC (1/2 week)
12. LC (1/2 week)
13. Electron Microscopy (2 week)
14. Atomic Force Microscopy (1 week)
15. X-ray Analysis Technology (1 week)

    Final Exam (1 week)
scorePolicy:
Term Performance Including Attendance and Homework(30%)
Mid-term Exam(30%)
Final Exam(40%)
materials: Principles of Instrumental Analysis (D.A. Skoog, 6th. ed.)
